(kolambaa, lankapuwath) – widya, thakshana ha paryeshana amathyanshaya sanwidhana kala ghana apadrawya kalamanakarana jathika kriyakari salasuma sakas kirime samuluwa widya, thakshana ha paryeshana amathya susil premajayantha mahathage pradhanathwayen, palath sabha saha palath palana amathya fayisar musthafa mahathage sahabhagithwayen pasugiyada bandaranayaka anusmarana jathyanthara sammanthrana shalawedi pawathwini.
ada namata wuwath ithiri wi aththe lankawa ya.
bandaranayaka mahatha nithignyayaku washayen aluthkade usawiye sewaya aarambha kala samayayi.
oba sithu saha pathu paridima dhanawadayata uruma kada watima dan shighragami wela.
ekak tharan ethkota rawuma hadila thiyenneth eken hinda mata hamadema apuruwata dakinna puluwan weyi.
uthsawa kaleta papadi tharaga pawathwana kaleta meheta ena papadi tharaga puhunuwana aya wadi wenawa.

mohu migamuwa thapal sthanayata pamina guwan thapal bhandayak lesa muhudu ashwayin saha muhudu kudallan adangu parsalaya the kudu yayi sadahan kara chinayata yawimata uthsaha kara thibu awasthawedi migamuwa wada balana thapal sthanadhipathi ke.ke.ji thanthige mahathata lada sakaya matha sidu kala parikshawakadi mema muhudu kudallan thogaya hamu wi thibe.

doha aarthika sammelaye wishesha aaradhitha amuththeku washayen sahabhagi wimata eeye(19) rathriye diwayinen pitathwa giya janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha ada aluyama 1 ta pamana katar jathyanthara guwanthotupala wetha langa wu bawa janadhipathi madhya anshaya sandahan karayi.

le galana thuwala sahithawa minis atasakili bawata path wemin sitiya di pawa deshapalana aragalaye niwaraudi dishawa handunagena katayuthu karannata eda ohu samaga siti athalossak komiyunistwadin katayuthu kala bawa porakaye satahan thulin juliyas fuchik bahira lokayata helidaraw kaleya.

wathman yahapalana aanduwe krida amathyawaraya lesa katayuthu kala dayasiri jayasekara manthriwaraya bhawitha kale kolambaa wijerama mawathe pihiti amathi nila niwasa wana athara eya nawatha aluthwadiya kara athayida wartha we.
